title: What is the purpose of the Muslim Ka'aba? What is its significance and origin? - Quora

response.answer_text: Peace be on you. Kaaba was first made by Hazrat Adam, (on whom be peace)Later Hazrat Ibrahim a.s. was told by Allah about its location and he and his son Hazrat Ismael a.s. rebuilt it.Human is made for worship [which should lead to paying rights of people]. Allah declared a Qibla [direction] to face for worship.Facing a direction unites followers.Facing Kaaba reminds prayer of Hazrat Ibrahim a.s., in which he prayed a great Prophet [s.a.w.]= be sent.Facing Kaaba reminds a follower to serve peaceful struggle for purpose of Holy Prophet s.a.w.TWENTY THREE OBJECTIVES OF KAABA DERIVED FROM QURAN [ch2,v126–130*] It is made for all humanity.It is abundant in blessings.It gives guidance for all people.It has all signs.It is place of Ibrahim a.s.Whoso enters it, enters peace.Pilgrimage to House is duty of those who can find way to there.Allah has made it as resort for humanity.It is place of safety.Take you the station of Ibrahim as a place of Prayer.Purify Allah’s House.Faithful makes circuit around it.Those who remain therein for devotion.Those who bow down and fall prostrate in Prayers.My Lord, make this a town of peace.Provide its dwellers with fruits.Our Lord accept this from us.Allah is All hearing.Allah is All-Knowing.Make our offspring a people submissive to You.Show us our ways of worship.Turn to us with mercy.Our Lord raise us among them a Messenger [PBUH] from among themselves.*Bismillah verse counted as #1  Useful
